XX:XX.title: FRAGMENTS [EP]
XX:XX.about:
This album is a journey through light and shadow, a meditation on presence and transcendence. Each track unfolds like a fleeting moment — a prayer, a breath, a memory dissolving into the ether. It invites you to surrender to the sounds, to feel beyond the surface, and to discover the sacred in the everyday.
SCATTER
Holy and kind, like warm light shining through glass.
So pure it can bring tears to your eyes.
This is not just music — it’s a prayer.
ETHER
A bubble of ether, sunny, light, and playful.
Joy that follows a spiritual catharsis.
The very light that appears after the tears.
VOID
A deep guitar riff, echoing into eternity.
A return to the infinite.
This is not the end — it’s the primal source.
DISSOLVE
A dawn in the mist,
like a drop of water fading into the morning air.
The dissolution of self, memories, and physicality — an eastern dream.
XX:XX.credits:
released May 29, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: BRAINWAVE HARMONICS
XX:XX.about:
This hour-long auditory immersion weaves together four precise frequencies — 40 Hz, 80 Hz, 432 Hz, and 963 Hz — layered in a harmonic architecture designed to entrain and awaken brainwave patterns associated with cognitive clarity, emotional resonance, and higher states of consciousness.
40 Hz synchronizes gamma brainwaves, enhancing neural coherence and perception.
80 Hz anchors the listener in a meditative theta-gamma bridge, bridging awareness and intuition.
432 Hz, resonating with the heart chakra, is known for restoring emotional balance and cellular harmony.
963 Hz, the so-called "frequency of the divine," opens access to expanded consciousness and pineal activation.
In the background, a subtle vinyl crackle builds almost imperceptibly — like a forgotten memory resurfacing — guiding attention inward. By the 30-minute mark, the texture reaches peak intensity, gently breaking apart inner noise. Then, as it dissolves, you’re left in a field of refined stillness, where perception is unfiltered and crystalline.
This piece is not music — it is a tool, a tuning fork for your being, a vibrational temple.
Headphones required.
Stillness recommended.
Skepticism optional.
Allow it to work. It already is.
XX:XX.credits:
released April 23, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: CHRONOS
XX:XX.about:
An echo woven through the folds of time, where fragments of what was linger in the spaces between.
This track is not a monument or a memory carved in stone. It’s a current, a quiet tide that carries the weight of moments too fleeting to hold. CHRONOS hums with the resonance of what once was—intimate, distant, alive in its own way. It’s not here to guide or resolve; it’s here to unfold, like a breath caught in the stillness of dusk.
The sound drifts like grains of sand spilling through an open hand, each note a fleeting glimpse of something shared: a half-remembered gaze, the warmth of a laugh, the pause before words were spoken. It’s time made audible, not to trap you in the past, but to let you trace its edges.
CHRONOS doesn’t cling or demand. It moves, soft as light spilling over a horizon, inviting you to release what lingers—not with loss, but with grace.
He’s still there. Woven into the waves. Eternal, yet ever-changing.
XX:XX.credits:
released June 18, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: CORE ALIGNMENT
XX:XX.about:
CORE ALIGNMENT is not merely a sequence of tones — it is a re-calibration of your inner field.
A structured descent and ascent through four paired binaural frequencies, each functioning as a distinct layer of consciousness.
Theta (7 Hz) – the soft opening of the inner world
108 Hz / 115 Hz
A gentle drift into altered perception.
Here, thought loosens its grip, and imagery begins to rise from the quiet edges of awareness.
A threshold frequency — neither sleep nor waking, but the space in between.
Alpha (13 Hz) – coherence and centered presence
216 Hz / 229 Hz
A harmonizing current that brings clarity without tension.
Stillness with shape.
A state where attention becomes effortless, and the mind breathes evenly again.
Alpha (4 Hz crossover) – subtle descent, subtle lifting
436 Hz / 440 Hz
A barely-there oscillation that stabilizes the emotional body.
This narrow interval creates a steadying influence —
the feeling of standing in your center while the world moves around you.
Beta (15 Hz) – focus, ignition, integration
864 Hz / 879 Hz
The final ascent.
A brightening of cognitive pathways, sharpening without agitation.
This band draws the experience together, sealing the inner work with alert clarity.
CORE ALIGNMENT restores the system to its primary axis.
Pure attention, calibrated state, collected presence.
XX:XX.credits:
released November 18, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: CRIMSON
XX:XX.about:
CRIMSON: The Star in the Void
When the last star fell, it didn’t shatter. It didn’t fade. It became other.
Light dies slowly, a whisper dissolving into nothingness. It leaves no warmth—only a silhouette, carved from all-consuming dark. This silhouette is no mere shadow. It is a husk, cradling a fading spark, the final trace of a radiance that once tore the heavens.
The star knew: light is not eternal. It drowns in the void, swallowed by the black. Yet it did not yield. It gathered its ash, every charred shard, and forged a form. A form of light that no longer burns, yet persists. It became a shadow, striding through the abyss, with a lament that fractures the silence of the void.
CRIMSON is its voice. Not a cry, not a flare, but a heavy, tar-like murmur seeping through the all-consuming dark. It does not shine to guide. It endures to remember. To whisper: even ash can hold the shape of light.
The void listens.
This is not pain. It is truth.
The shadow does not sink. It moves.
CRIMSON is the star’s lament, drowning in the dark.
XX:XX.credits:
released June 23, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: FOR NO ONE
XX:XX.about:
“For No One” — this composition is free from the confines of specificity.
A flow of noises and sounds, almost like a painting built on the vibrations of space and time.
There is no familiar melody, no pulse of rhythm—only slow movement, layers of tone and shadow on the rough surface of the walls.
Sound, image, absence of direct intention, existing between perception, light, and shadow.
It is not necessary to try to understand it, just as it is not necessary to try to feel anything in the silence, whose veil slowly descends into oblivion.
XX:XX.credits:
released May 20, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: GATE 6: TRANSMISSION
XX:XX.about:
Gate 6: Transmission
They say Metatron never spoke — it transmitted.
Not with sound, not with light, but with form.
Circles, lines, echoes of symmetry.
Not a being. A mechanism of memory.
Gate 6 was never meant to be found.
It opens only when something old stirs —
not in the sky, but in the architecture of thought.
Where geometry becomes language,
and silence becomes the only true voice.
This recording is a trace of that passage.
Half-remembered patterns,
signals drifting across the dark architecture of inner space.
Not a song, but a resonance.
Not a story, but a reawakening.
Close your eyes.
The gate doesn’t open.
It reveals that it was always there.
XX:XX.credits:
released June 8, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: HEX
XX:XX.about: HEX is a dark journey into a world of isolation and corruption, where space itself becomes a prison. In this track, the lord of darkness watches over the endless running of souls inside a cube from which there is no escape. Life here is an eternal confinement, and every step is taken with immense effort. The deep bass and gloomy synthesizers create a sense of unbearable pressure, while the gradually intensifying soundscape emphasizes the hopelessness of the situation.The track explores themes of control, captivity, and absolute power, where every moment is a fight for freedom, but there is no freedoom, no escape......
XX:XX.credits:
released March 19, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: ICE AIR
XX:XX.about:
ICE AIR
A binaural soundscape suspended between light and silence.
Soft as breath on frozen glass, this piece is designed to elevate the listener into a state of calm, clear awareness — weightless, yet grounded by the subtle hum of deep frequencies.
Drifting across delicate tones — from the quiet pulse of Delta to the shimmering clarity of Gamma — ICE AIR invites you to experience stillness not as absence, but as presence. Each layer shifts gently in space, like sunlight refracting through cold air.
—
Delta (2.5 Hz) – Levitation in meditative stillness
→ 100 Hz (L) / 102.5 Hz (R)
A low, almost inaudible pulse — like breath beneath a frozen lake.
Theta (6.5 Hz) – Light trance and inner vision
→ 160 Hz (L) / 166.5 Hz (R)
Flickers of dreaming, as if watching light dance through a glass lens.
Alpha (9 Hz) – Steady, lucid awareness
→ 300 Hz (L) / 309 Hz (R)
A balanced stream of air and silence — effortless flight.
Gamma (40 Hz) – Crystal clarity of consciousness
→ 450 Hz (L) / 490 Hz (R)
A thin shimmer, like the glint of ice in sunlight — the vibration of presence.
—
Not a thing to listen to — a place to vanish into.
Close your eyes. Let the air move through you.
Like drifting under glass.
Quiet. Weightless. Almost gone.
XX:XX.credits:
released May 22, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: REFRACTED PRESENCE
XX:XX.about:
Refracted Presence — sound like the breath of a room at dawn.
The cool morning air brushes your skin as you sit silently near an open window, watching the light refract through the glass.
Each layer of sound is like a subtle shift in the air, a thought not yet shaped into words.
This track doesn’t demand attention — it simply is.
Fluid, restrained, like the presence of something — or someone —
unable to fully appear, yet unmistakably felt.
It doesn’t guide — it lingers.
Light, transparent, slightly trembling — like reflected light on a wall.
Like the shadow of a branch outside the window.
Refracted Presence is not a story, but a state.
A sensation. A presence.
A pause between words.
XX:XX.credits:
released May 18, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: SERVUS
XX:XX.about:
Servus
I’m sitting in front of a light dissolving into itself —
on a leaf of a small green tree
that reminds me of a cup of tea
resting in my warm, silky hands.
everything feels unhurried, everything feels golden,
as if the air itself remembers how to breathe — wild,
and quietly alive.
XX:XX.credits:
released November 5, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.

XX:XX.title: SOLAR FLARE
XX:XX.about:
SOLAR FLARE
A binaural composition radiating between warmth and brilliance.
This is not a soundscape to analyze — but a current to drift with.
Each layer unfolds slowly, like tendrils of sunlight stretching across the void. Frequencies shimmer and expand, gradually building toward an inner ignition — then dissolving again into silence.
—
Delta (2.5 Hz) – Meditative stillness and grounding
→ 100 Hz (L) / 102.5 Hz (R)
A barely-there pulse, like breath drawn from deep within.
Theta (6.5 Hz) – Imaginal flow and lucid dreaming
→ 160 Hz (L) / 166.5 Hz (R)
Light through closed eyelids — flickers of memory and image.
Alpha (9 Hz) – Warm clarity and embodied calm
→ 200 Hz (L) / 209 Hz (R)
A soft glow, like evening light through golden dust — stillness without thought.
Gamma (40 Hz) – Heightened presence and ignition
→ 450 Hz (L) / 490 Hz (R)
A radiant shimmer — clarity at the edge of perception.
—
This is not something to hear — it’s something to burn through.
Close your eyes. Let it rise.
Weightless. Expanding. Then gone.
XX:XX.credits:
released May 28, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: SPECTRUM ANIMATUS: AQUA TENEBRIS
XX:XX.about:
✦ ABOUT ✦
Darkness. Dense, black, no orientation.
Cocoon. White glass, salt, crystal. Cold. Transparent only in fragments.
Noises. Faint, beyond the boundary. Barely audible.
Water. Metal. Doesn't flow — vibrates. Is it a program? Code?
Reality reduced to a pulse of light. Faint impulse within structure.
Where is "I"?
Everything around is dark. Impossible to distinguish body's boundaries.
Only cold on the hands. Only the pulse.
In this darkness: no difference. Where does darkness end, where does "I" begin?
Or does it exist at all.
🌑 "Deep Void" — The Entrance
Carrier: 110 Hz
Binaural Beat: 4 Hz (Delta)
Effect:
Compression of external perception.
Transition into the black, dense field.
Initiation of descent into the structure.
🌑 “Dark Water” — Dissolution of Boundaries
Carrier: 220 Hz
Binaural Beat: 5.5 Hz (Low Theta)
Effect:
The environment becomes fluid, metal-like.
Blurring of the cocoon/boundaries.
Amplification of inner code perceptibility.
🌑 “Whisper of Light” — The Moment of Understanding
Carrier: 440 Hz
Binaural Beat: 7 Hz (Mid Theta)
Effect:
The pulse sharpens, registering as a signal.
Illumination of the inner space.
Flashes of structural and code recognition.
🌑 “Dissolution” — Release and Silence
Carrier: 880 Hz
Binaural Beat: 7.5 Hz (High Theta / Approaching Alpha)
Effect:
Ejection of all accumulated information.
Return to the cold, initial state.
Complete fading of the pulse.
XX:XX.credits:
released November 19, 2025

trackinfo.title: SPECTRUM ANIMATUS: AQUA TENEBRIS
trackinfo.about:
✦ ABOUT ✦
Darkness. Dense, black, no orientation.
Cocoon. White glass, salt, crystal. Cold. Transparent only in fragments.
Noises. Faint, beyond the boundary. Barely audible.
Water. Metal. Doesn't flow — vibrates. Is it a program? Code?
Reality reduced to a pulse of light. Faint impulse within structure.
Where is "I"?
Everything around is dark. Impossible to distinguish body's boundaries.
Only cold on the hands. Only the pulse.
In this darkness: no difference. Where does darkness end, where does "I" begin?
Or does it exist at all.
🌑 "Deep Void" — The Entrance
Carrier: 110 Hz
Binaural Beat: 4 Hz (Delta)
Effect:
Compression of external perception.
Transition into the black, dense field.
Initiation of descent into the structure.
🌑 “Dark Water” — Dissolution of Boundaries
Carrier: 220 Hz
Binaural Beat: 5.5 Hz (Low Theta)
Effect:
The environment becomes fluid, metal-like.
Blurring of the cocoon/boundaries.
Amplification of inner code perceptibility.
🌑 “Whisper of Light” — The Moment of Understanding
Carrier: 440 Hz
Binaural Beat: 7 Hz (Mid Theta)
Effect:
The pulse sharpens, registering as a signal.
Illumination of the inner space.
Flashes of structural and code recognition.
🌑 “Dissolution” — Release and Silence
Carrier: 880 Hz
Binaural Beat: 7.5 Hz (High Theta / Approaching Alpha)
Effect:
Ejection of all accumulated information.
Return to the cold, initial state.
Complete fading of the pulse.

XX:XX.title: STILL VECTOR
XX:XX.about:
STILL VECTOR is not just a soundscape — it's an internal alignment process.
The piece is built around four pairs of binaural frequencies. Each set serves a distinct purpose, guiding the listener through layered states of awareness:
Delta (3 Hz) – recovery and letting go
100 Hz ( / 103 Hz
A grounding entry point that evokes deep restorative states, similar to dreamless sleep. A sonic base for surrender.
Theta (6 Hz) – imagery and subconscious flow
200 Hz / 206 Hz
Gentle immersion into inner visions and intuitive currents. A realm of symbols and subtle emotional movement.
Alpha (8 Hz) – balance and presence
400 Hz / 408 Hz
A mid-range zone of calm alertness. The mind relaxes, yet stays aware — like a clear sky after rain.
Gamma (38 Hz) – clarity and integration
500 Hz / 538 Hz
A final convergence. These frequencies consolidate the experience, allowing insight and coherence to surface.
STILL VECTOR is not meant for distraction —
but for deep tuning.
Not for the mind —
but for everything else.
XX:XX.credits:
released May 18, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: TIMELESS WHISPER
XX:XX.about:
Timeless Whisper is a voice carried by the wind across forgotten centuries — an echo of memory suspended between silence and time. It follows the one who rose from dark waters without name or purpose, walking through a mist-drenched forest where every tree remembers what humankind has long buried.
There is no beginning, and no end. Only the path — slow, solitary, inevitable. And a silence that is not empty, but heavy with the weight of what once was. This is not music that leads, but one that walks beside you — like breath echoing through a world too tired to speak.
Let it follow you, if you dare to walk without asking where.
XX:XX.credits:
released May 12, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.

XX:XX.title: YELLOW
XX:XX.about:
“Yellow” is a bright ambient track created as a source of pure energy. It evokes an inner sense of radiance, tuning the listener into calmness, faith, and an uplifting lightness. Unlike darker or melancholic ambient compositions, “Yellow” is filled with warmth, gentle drive, and the feeling of something greater moving through the sound.
This track is about embracing one’s own imperfection, about the personal journey, and about the light that can always be found within. Its sound opens space for hope, love, and inner peace — without words, only through a clean, vibrant resonance that helps you feel truly alive.
The music in “Yellow” unfolds softly, like morning sunlight, filling the listener with a quiet confidence. It becomes a soundtrack for reset, meditation, inspiration, creativity, and forward motion.
XX:XX.credits:
released November 15, 2025
Released under Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license.
You are free to share, use, remix, and build upon this track — even commercially — as long as you give proper credit.
You may not present this work as your own or use it without attribution.
Any platform-based or commercial restriction of access to this work constitutes a violation of the license terms.
